Question
========

Two nurses (vpk1 and vpk2) measure in 41 patients right after each other's heart rates. The results are shown in the attached scatterplot, accompanied by a 45-degree line through the origin.______________________ The maximum deviation in measured heart rate between the two nurses is equal to:

![](uva-scatterplot-1219-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* 12
* 14
* 17
* 22

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 12:Incorrect
* 14: Incorrect
* 17: Correct
* 22: Incorrect
